general.title: SEA-MAT: Matlab Tools for Oceanographic Analysis
general.description: This site is a collaborative effort to organize and distribute Matlab tools for the oceanographic community. Matlab is multi-platform software that provides numeric computation, technical graphics and visualization, and an intuitive programming language for applications in engineering and science. This site provides links to and downloads of code for oceanographic data analysis tools, including time series analysis, numerical modelling, mapping, hydrography, and data interface.
